title: LifeBox
description: LifeBox is a social network for exploring Conway's Game Of Life. Users can create initial conditions for a game in the form of a grid. Grids that have been saved can be loaded and commented upon by LifeBox users.  This App was created with React, Flask, PostgreSQL, Canvas and S3.

title: Chatter
description: A twitter like social network with basic CRUD operations. Chatter was a group project completed with a team of four, during my time at AppAcademy. We used React, Flask, and S3 primarily. This project was a great experience in learning about React, and also best practices for GitHub work flows with a team.

title: NoiseWave
description: My "hello world" app. NoiseWave is a soundcloud like music platform, where users can upload and stream music. This project was created by a team of four utilizing, vanilla javascript, express, sequelize, pug, and an S3 bucket. This page also utilizes ajax to allow users to continually stream music while navigating the site.
